metadata.name: ASCENSION
metadata.description:
This artwork is my personal expression of the essence of ascension. I wanted to create a visual representation of the state of unity with the Divine, where our awareness and understanding of true nature expands beyond the limited ego self. I achieved this through the use of a calming color palette, optical overlays, and a model's relaxed posture.

I believe that Art has the power to transport us to new realms of understanding and awareness, and my hope is for the viewer to be inspired to explore the depths of their own being and discover the beauty, sense of peace, tranquility and unity that lies within.
